    getReadContent() {
    let i = 0
    while (i < this.state.contents.length) {
      let data = this.state.contents[i]
      if (data.id === this.state.selectedcontentid) {
        return data
        break
      }
      i += 1;
    }
  }

    <Control 
        onChangeMode = {function(_mode) {
          if (_mode === 'Delete') { //ë§Œì•½ í´ë¦­ëœ controlì´ deleteë¼ë©´
            if (window.confirm('delete?')) { //ì‚¬ìš©ìê°€ ì‚­ì œ í™•ì¸ ë²„íŠ¼ì„ ëˆ„ë¥¸ë‹¤ë©´
              //ì™„ì „ë³µì‚¬
              const _contents = Array.from(this.state.contents)
              let i = 0;
              while (i < _contents.length) {
                if (this.state.selectedcontentid === _contents[i].id) { //ë§Œì•½ ì°¾ìœ¼ë©´
                  _contents.splice(i,1);

                  break
                }
                i += 1
              }

              this.setState({
                mode:'welcome',
                contents: _contents,
              })
            }
          } else {
          this.setState({
            mode : _mode
            })
          }
        }.bind(this)}
        />
